subject: Embezzlement
lead_paragraph: Steven Wetzel, 39, has been charged with stealing $91,000 from a charity for terminally ill children that he founded in the memory of a player who made national headlines while dying of cancer.
snippet: Steven Wetzel, 39, has been charged with stealing $91,000 from a charity for terminally ill children that he founded in the memory of a player who made national headlines while dying of cancer.
